name: DOBA DASH
description: Doba-Dash is a 3D combat-racing game centred around informal waste collectors. In the exciting imaginative new game, these recycling heroes have their own underground cart racing scene where they do whatever it takes to outwit and outdo each other through speed and clever use of weapons made out of waste material in order to win trash bags which ,like in reality, secure a means of income but also a cleaner environment.
